document.title: [PSN] Mise a jour speciale PS Vita
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici une mise à jour exceptionnelle pour le lancement de la PS Vita . Cette mise à jour sera disponible en fin d’après-midi , voire début de soirée.
Mise à jour du PlayStation Store de la PS Vita Jeux PlayStation Vita Uncharted: Golden Abyss (44.99€) – PEGI 16 Wipeout 2048 + Network pass (34.99€) – PEGI 7 Escape Plan (12.99€) – PEGI 12 Everybody’s Golf (34.99€) – PEGI 3 Little Deviants Trial & Unlock (24.99€) – PEGI 7 Modnation Racers: Road Trip (34.99€) – PEGI 7 Reality Fighters (24.99€) – PEGI 12 Hustle Kings (Seulement sur le PSN) (7.99€) – PEGI 3 Motorstorm RC (Seulement sur le PSN) (5.99€) – PEGI 3 Super Stardust™ Delta (PSN seulement) (7.99€) – PEGI 3 Super Stardust Delta & DLC Bundle (9.99€) – PEGI 3 Top Darts (Psn seulement) (7.99€) Rating; PEGI 3 Plants Vs Zombies (Soe) (11.25€) – PEGI 12 Cliff Diving (Ar Suite – Digital) (gratuit) – PEGI 12 Table Football (Ar Suite – Digital) (gratuit) – PEGI 3 Fireworks (Ar Suite – Digital) (gratuit) – PEGI 3 Army Corps Of Hell (39.99€) – PEGI 12 Virtua Tennis 4 – World Tour Edition (39.99€) – PEGI 3 Asphalt: Injection (24.99€) – PEGI 7 Lumines Electronic Symphony (34.99€) – PEGI 3 Rayman Origins (34.99€) – PEGI 7 EA Sports FIFA Football (49.99€) – PEGI 3 Shinobido 2 (39.99€) – PEGI 16 Touch My Katamari (29.99€) – PEGI 6 Blazblue Continuum Shift Extend (39.99€) – PEGI 12 Michael Jackson The Experience HD (19.99€) – PEGI 12 Ultimate Marvel Vs Capcom 3 (44.99€) – PEGI 12 Dynasty Warriors Next (34.99€) – PEGI 12 Ninja Gaiden Sigma Plus (34.99€) – PEGI 18 Ridge Racer Gold Pass (6.99€) – PEGI 3 Ridge Racer (19.99€) – PEGI 3 Dungeon Hunter: Alliance (34.99€) – PEGI 16 A-Men (14.99€) – PEGI 12 F1 2011 (49.99€) – PEGI 3 Tales From Space: Mutant Blobs Attack (6.99€) – PEGI 7 Applications Facebook (gratuit) Live Tweet (gratuit) Flickr (gratuit) Foursquare (gratuit) Contenus téléchargeables Everybody’s Golf Network Pass (9.99€) – PEGI 3 Reality Fighters Network Pass (9.99€) – PEGI 12 Wipeout 2048 Network Pass (9.99€) – PEGI 7 Hustle Kings – PEGI 3 – Hustle Kings Snooker Pack (2.99€) – Time Savers Pack (1.49€) Uncharted: Golden Abyss (0.99€) – PEGI 16 Modnation Racers Road Trip – Unlock All (3.99€) – PEGI 7 Super Stardust Delta: Advanced Star Fighter Pack (2.99€) – PEGI 3 Motorstorm RC (Dual Compatible DLC) – PEGI 3 – Access All Areas Pass (0.99€) – RC Collection Pass (0.99€) – Full Game Pass (1.49€) – Rare Rally Car: Patriot Enforcer – Disponible seulement 14 jours (0.99€) – Rare Rally Car: Italia Buttercream – Disponible seulement 14 jours (gratuit) Touch My Katamari – PEGI 3 – Download Request #1: Snowman! – Download Request #2: Shopping – Katamari Songs: All In One Pack (Bundle) (5.99€) – Inclut les contenus suivants disponibles à l’unité : – Katamari Songs: Namco Pack (2.49€) – Katamari Songs: Chic Pack (2.49€) – Katamari Songs: Vocal Pack (2.49€) Ultimate Marvel Vs Capcom 3 – PEGI 12 – Additional Character: Jill (4.99€) – Animal Pack (3.99€) – Brawler Pack (3.99€) – Femme Fatale Pack (3.99€) – New Age Of Heroes Pack (3.99€) – The Evil Twin Pack (3.99€) – The Rising Dead Pack (3.99€) – Viewtiful Strange Pack (3.99€) – Villain Pack (3.99€) – Weapon Expert Pack (3.99€) – Additional Character: Shuma-Gorath (4.99€) – Costume Pack (4.99€) Ridge Racer – PEGI 3 – Add-On Course 01 ‘Old Central’ (2.49€) – Add-On Car 02 ‘Elenie’ (1.49€) – Music Pack 01 (gratuit) – Music Pack 02 (gratuit) – Music Pack 03 (gratuit) – Music Pack 04 (gratuit) – Music Pack 06 (gratuit) – Music Pack 07 (gratuit) – Music Pack 08 (gratuit) – Music Pack 09 (gratuit) – Music Pack 10 (gratuit) – New Songs Pack 01 (0.99€) Démos Uncharted: Golden Abyss Demo – PEGI 16 Modnation Racers Road Trip Demo – PEGI 7 Dynasty Warriors Next Demo – PEGI 12 Unit 13 Demo – PEGI 16 Wipeout 2048 Demo – PEGi 7 EA Sports FIFA Football – PEGI 3 Vidéos Hustle Kings In Action Trailer Reality Fighters Trailer Wipeout 2048 Trailer Escape Plan Trailer Everybody’S Golf Trailer Little Deviants Trailer Modnation Racers: Road Trip Trailer Super Stardust Delta Trailer Super Stardust Delta Gameplay Trailer Uncharted: Golden Abyss Trailer Plants Vs Zombies Trailer (Soe) Stardrone Announce Trailer Virtua Tennis 4: World Tour Edition – Features Trailer
Tout un tas de jeux PS Vita , les mêmes qu’en magasin + les jeux PSN. Sachez que la mienne arrivera normalement demain, j’ai hâte ! 😉 J-1 !!
